oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mastitis in the Beef Cow and Its Effects on Calf Weight Gain
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Newman, M. A.
Eberhart, R. J.
Cash, E. H.
Drake, T. R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: beef cows
mastitis pathogens
mastitis
calf weight gain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Quarter samples for culture were collected from 120 beef cows in early, mid, and late lactation to assess prevalence of mastitis pathogens and effects of mastitis on calf weight gain. In early, mid and late lactation respectively, 25.8, 29.2, and 54.4% of cows and 13.1, 14.9, and 27.5% of quarters were infected.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1990; 149
